## Our Partner Universities

The University of Westminster (UOW), UK and Robert Gordon University (RGU), UK have partnered with IIT in offering undergraduate degrees in Business and Information Technology. The Foundation Programme in Higher Education consists of two specialized pathways in Business and IT, which have several entryways to the degree programmes. IIT also provides students the opportunity to upgrade their skills through postgraduate degree programmes.
